Reviews.Title: “Really good value, excellent stay!”
Reviews.Author: sugottfried
Reviews.Content: threenight stay arts et hotel found value perfect location 6th floor labeled nice armoire hanging clothes putting shelves desk chair nice sized bed tables window outdoor air adequate bathroom elevator available fast metro street grocery carrefour provisions days town breakfast included generous including fruit snacks desk staffed staff helpful accommodating highly recommend hotel stay paris

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights hotel spring satisfied experience location central paris sites metro steps kept wifi free reservation included breakfast included assortment breads cheese yogurt fruit juice coffee staff quick provide tips travel paris airport inconvenience iron ironing board front desk bring overall pleasant experience
